tooltip.gensokyoontology.praxis_sword_sh: 如果你能游戏里编程，那么为什么不去现实中试一试呢
patchouli.gensokyoontology.book.landing_: $(l)Fore Words:$(br)Stay $(4)S$(b)A$(d)N$(2)E!$() You're now in the $(k)(m)meaningless network$() of $(l)ideologies.$() Be $(l)$(#ff0000)CLEAR AWARE$() of this!
patchouli.gensokyoontology.overview.intr: All the cultural works made by human kind no matter a mass culture or a subculture can be interpreted as a certain kind of forms of ideologies. Ideologies are everywhere acting like atmosphere. It is so universal that we have no idea that we are actually subordinated to it and became its properties.
Try to reify the embodiment of all kinds of ideologies is the target of this book. Now follow this guidebook to visualize and realize yourselves.
patchouli.gensokyoontology.ideologies.de: $(l)$(o)$(#eb82ee)Science is not your Jesus Christ! Nor Philosophy!
patchouli.gensokyoontology.ideologies.er: Well, it seems that you have to find a container to paint, follow the lead to paint on the correct pixel location with correct color type.
patchouli.gensokyoontology.ideologies.di: Yes! Programming in Minecraft. Remember what I wrote on the first page? Stay sane! or you will become Cyber Spirits. To check whether you could read this digital gibberish to test if you are becoming cyber ghost or not.

In inner IDE, your code should be highlighted like this:$(br2)$(l)SAMPLE 1: $(br)$(1)public abstract class$() $(l)ThrowableEntity $(1)extends$() $(l)ProjectileEntity(){$(br)  $(1)protected$() $(l)$(#ffa500)ThrowableEntity$()$(l)(EntityType<? $(1)extends$() $(l)ThrowableEntity> type, World worldIn) {$(br)$(1)    super$() $(l)worldIn;$(br)  }$(br)})
